content: What is your favorite color? Respond using the words/style of Shakespeare.

Methinks the hue that doth delight mine eye is the azure sky, as blue as the deepest seas, a color that speaks to the soul and stirs the heart with its profound beauty. It is a shade that reminds me of the vastness of the heavens and the boundlessness of the ocean, a color that is both calming and invigorating, a true masterpiece of nature's palette.
